incident_updates.body: Start time : 16/09/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 16/09/2022 11:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In order to improve the quality of the optical links, our teams will carry out a maintenance operation on our internal links

Start time : 19/09/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 19/09/2022 06:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in rack L115A04 will be turned off during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on our water cooling system.

Start time : 19/09/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 19/09/2022 08:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in rack L105B06will be turned off during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on our water cooling system.

Start time : 19/09/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 20/09/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, some electrical background work will be done related to racks in G312 and G313.

Start time : 19/09/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 19/09/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing an electrical maintenance in rooms 0 and 1 in order to test the electrical redundancy of the rooms.
Due to an imponderable, we have to postpone the intervention Start time : 19/09/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 19/09/2022 22:00 UTC
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Start time : 14/09/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a network maintenance on our backbone between Marseilles and Singapore
